programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Two house-hunters wish to relocate somewhere they can grow their own vegetables and indulge their love of culture, so experts Laura Hamilton and Jasmine Harman are on hand to show them a variety of properties in Dorset and Croatia to aid them in making their decision.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.sub-title: Falmouth, Cornwall v Kotor Bay, Montenegro.
programme.desc: Property experts Jasmine Harman and Laura Hamilton assist Lisa and Tony Edwards, who want to buy a property in either Falmouth on Cornwall's south coast, or Kotor Bay, Montenegro, where they were married three years previously.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton and Jasmine Harman help recently widowed Jan decide whether to spend her £100,000 budget on a house near to her sister in Kent, or a renovation project to keep her busy in Abruzzo, Italy.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: A range of properties in Bournemouth, Dorset, and Sicily provide food for thought for the owners of a B&B in northern France, who are ready for a slower pace of life in a different country.(n)

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: Southport estate agent Gill and her friend Sue look round properties in Alicante, while in Almeria, Chris and Carol are also looking to make a permanent move to the sun.(n)

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: Special needs teacher Kerry Smith seeks a holiday home in southern Spain, but her limited budget forces her to consider properties more inland than she would have wished.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Anthony Wedo, President and CEO of Buffets, Inc, goes undercover to find out what his staff members are really like. He was brought on to the team to turn the firm around after years of challenges and poses as a construction worker to find out the flaws in the business.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Amit Kleinberger, the CEO and co-owner of frozen yoghurt chain Menchie's, poses as a participant in a reality TV contest to find out whether consistency is being maintained in his stores. The company has experienced rapid growth and Amit tries to establish what changes must be made to become a billion-dollar business.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef revisits two restaurants, Giuseppi's and Sante La Brea, to find out whether the owners took his advice on how to raise standards. Plus, an update on Finn McCool's.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef heads to family-owned Italian restaurant Giuseppi's in Macomb Township, Michigan. Father and son Joe and Sam Borgia's constant fighting is driving customers away, and Gordon discovers one of the restaurateurs is concealing a serious health problem. Nevertheless, he sets about rescuing them from disaster and turning around the failing business.(n)

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: Jan Fursier has discovered in one of her father Reg's diaries an illustrated guide to building a 1930s caravan, drawn up while he was being held in a Japanese prisoner of war camp. George Clarke and Will Hardie attempt to bring the caravan to life, leading to an emotional reunion in the same Welsh national park where Reg took the family on holidays once the Second World War was over.(n)

programme.title: Great British Buildings: Restoration of the Year
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud and Anna Keay visit some of the UK's most successful restorations of historic buildings, all of which have been placed on the Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors' long list for their Restoration of the Year award. First up are a watermill brought back to life in Cambridgeshire, a seaside villa in Lyme Regis, a Georgian innovation in Northumberland, and a rescued castle in Ceredigion. At the end of the programme, Kevin and Anna hear which buildings have been chosen to make the final shortlist.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Twenty-year-old Antonio is rushed to A&E after a motorcycle accident leaves him with a severe fracture to his leg and the medical team are concerned about a potential arterial bleed. Meanwhile, doctors investigate the damage to the chest and lungs of 40-year-old Karen, who fell off her horse, which then trampled on her, while leukaemia patient Hayley, 29, comes to St George's with wife Emma after suffering an infection and low immune system.(n)

programme.title: 999: What's Your Emergency
programme.desc: The challenges faced by emergency services on the roads, revealing how new technology can detect people driving under the influence of drugs, leading to a rise in convictions. A woman is found to be over the limit while driving only a few streets away from her home. Emergency services personnel reveal the problems they have when dealing with elderly motorists who may no longer be able to drive safely, and how responding to an incident can have lasting repercussions.(n)

programme.title: Three Wives, One Husband
programme.desc: Documentary providing access to the community of Rockland Ranch in the middle of the Utah desert, where 14 Mormon families have made a home for themselves. Half the men here are polygamists, including father-of-16 Enoch Foster. He is one of the most influential men in the community and has two wives, who adore him and each other. But their family is set to expand again, with baby number 17 on the way - and Enoch is also courting a third wife, 25-year-old nanny Lydia.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Fairy-tale fan Kathleen still hasn't met her Prince Charming, but at first glance, international fashion model Sam doesn't disappoint. Historical re-enactor Rory meets Aussie cross-stitcher Maddie, and woos her with his knowledge of Viking beards, while animal lover Steph is paired with fireman Rich. Will she be impressed with his stories of saving cats from burning buildings?.(n)

programme.title: A Very British Brothel
programme.desc: Documentary charting the day-to-day workings of a Sheffield massage parlour run by a mother and daughter, revealing the struggle to fill the daily rota and how management deal with problem clients. The programme also explores the lives of the women who advertise their services and for whom sex is just a job.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The eagle-eyed armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week. The programme captures their instant reactions and lively discussions from the comfort of their own homes.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: The Hi Way elephant family have been hit with a potentially deadly virus affecting animals in captivity and in the wild. With the youngest members of the family most at risk, the keepers and Chester Zoo's veterinary team do all they can to combat the mysterious illness. Meanwhile, Mac the stallion zebra is introduced to the zoo's three mares in the hope they will produce much needed offspring for this endangered species. There's also a look into the bizarre world of the naked mole rat.(n)

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau
programme.desc: Dick and Angel only have a few weeks to prepare for their wedding, but the chateau is nowhere near ready to receive the 200 guests they have invited and finding reliable, affordable workers is proving difficult. Dick oversees the damming of the moat and the installation of a new, eco-friendly sewage system, while Angel turns her attention to giving the rooms a distinctive decor.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: James Constantinou jets off to Palma to investigate a yacht thought to be worth £150,000, while Prestige Pawnbrokers' memorabilia expert Lawrence values a guitar signed by Oasis. An impressive diamond bracelet gives new branch manager Alicja a chance to secure an international client and a vivacious prospective customer hopes the proceeds from the sale of a set of designer handbags might help get a new business venture off the ground.(n)

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: Sharon and Steve have three properties to show Andy and Jo Green for their 100,000 euro budget, but are put on the back foot when the couple change their brief halfway through.(n)

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Randy DeWitt, the CEO and co-founder of bar and grill chain Twin Peaks, goes undercover to find out whether the company's culture is keeping up with its rapid growth. Posing as a contestant on a reality TV competition, he works among his own staff.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples host dinner parties in Dartford and Beckenham, with Jamie and Carol, Paul and Justin, and Richard and Julie all competing for the cash prize of £1,000.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Glasgow pair Jean and Ron hope their `taste of Scotland' menu will impress their guests. Day two sees Colin and Craig try to claw back the limelight and jolly up the mood.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef travels to Newbury Park in southern California to help Mexican restaurant Mama Rita's. The owner previously ran a successful catering company but has struggled to adapt her skills to meet the demands of a new business - and with a year's worth of food stored in the freezer Gordon realises he has a tough job ahead.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The fiery chef comes to the aid of the owners of Hannah & Mason's, a French bistro in Cranbury, New Jersey. Members of staff complain their pay cheques bounce, and the kitchen cooler is so unhygienic that Gordon makes the decision to close the restaurant on Valentine's Day - the busiest night of the year.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton heads for the south of France to help a passionate Francophile locate the perfect retirement property. Meanwhile, Luke Doonan is approached by the woman's youngest daughter, who is concerned about her mother's plans to emigrate and asks him to find an alternative home in Cornwall.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin and Laura Hamilton come to the aid of creative couple Victor and Penny from London. The pair are searching for a relaxing getaway and must choose between buying a home in Kent, which would make for an easy weekend commute, or finding a property in Penny's preferred location, Florence in Italy.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp helps first-time buyers Lucy and Joe, who have set their heart on a cottage in the Cotswolds, where they can start a family. However, Joe wants a project and has already discounted hundreds of potential homes online, so it looks like he's going to be hard to please. Phil's search is just as difficult in Bristol, where country boy Paul and city girl Elly want a home with outside space that's close to the railway station. Finding somewhere that ticks all the boxes could be tricky.(n)

programme.title: The World's Most Expensive Food
programme.desc: London is home to more billionaires than any other city on the planet and they use a private network of luxury food suppliers. This two-part documentary follows the companies who cater to them, with the opening episode examining how businesses must adapt and fight harder than ever before to win a foothold in this lucrative new market.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Experienced enforcement agent Stewart and trainee Iain head to Blackpool to chase down a builder owing nearly £3,500 to an unhappy customer, whilst father and son Del and Dael are in Essex to collect over £2,500 owed to a frozen food company. In south London, Del and Brian attempt to recover nearly £10,000 from a debtor who acted as guarantor for a friend's rental agreement, ending in a bizarre stand-off with the debtor's daughter.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Gareth and Craig investigate a possible case of mistaken identity in Shropshire, then in south Wales find themselves embroiled in a bitter dispute between two dog owners over a vet's bill. Steve and Phil have to evict a distraught young family from a former high street bank in west London, before paying a call on an elderly tailor in north London.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Agents Stewart and Iain head to Manchester, where a landlord is owed £8,000 in rent arrears and has already called for police back-up. As tempers rise, the pair must find a way to handle a situation that is spiralling dangerously out of control. Meanwhile, Brian and Del chase £3,000 owed to a firm of letting agents, before tracking a debtor who was accidentally over-paid for a job. Plus, Stewart and Iain face an eviction that is set to test their patience.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: The enforcement officers visit a former professional footballer who owes £4,500 in unpaid legal fees, and in London the officers chase up a £4,000 debt owed by a car dealer. Elsewhere, agents Gary Brown and Cona Jackson are involved in a serious altercation with a young man who owes almost £11,000, who threatens the officers with a knife when they start listing goods to seize to offset the debt.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits: Living the High Life.
programme.desc: The documentary about people fighting to make ends meet catches up with some of those featured in earlier editions. They include 54-year-old Londoner Kim, known as the `millionaire shoplifter', who is determined to leave her thieving days behind her. In Warrington, one-time Big Brother contestant Lisa's quest for fame is reinvigorated after a visit to a psychic. With a new agent and book deal on the horizon, she enjoys a VIP night out which gets the attention of the paparazzi. Meanwhile, after a cancer scare, Brighton woman Blossom is due for an exploratory operation - the results of which may be life-changing.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Benefits Handout
programme.desc: Business is going well for Adam and Leanne, although making money from gardening remains a steep learning curve, especially when the couple under-quote for a job. Fran and Dan have finally bought a burger van, but Fran worries they have made a big mistake. In Basildon, Sophie forgets her money-making efforts and presses on with her battle to keep a roof over her children's heads.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits: Life on the Dole.
programme.desc: Couples planning the perfect wedding on benefits, including Middlesbrough couple Ellie and John, who are young and in love but out of work. John is eager to give his fiancee the white wedding she craves - but is such a thing possible on benefits? The programme also catches up with Michelle and Steven from Plymouth, who recently celebrated their first anniversary. Both too overweight to work, they continue their attempts to diet while living off the state. Plus, the story of Joanna and Andrew from Cwmbran, who combined all their benefits with a loan to pay for their wedding, which was shown live on Channel 5 in the summer of 2015.(n)

programme.title: Don't Tell the Doctor
programme.desc: The medics help a woman who ended up in hospital after too much exercise and dieting, a Cardiff woman with a bowel problem and a singer who sweats too much.(n)

programme.title: Sex Pod
programme.desc: A 24-year-old wants to know how he can last longer in the bedroom, a woman asks how for a few tips on how her boyfriend can use his hands more, and a couple of men ask about STIs.(n)

programme.desc: Part two of two. Sister Jude enlists the aid of a renowned Nazi hunter to gather evidence against Dr Arden, and Kit makes a surprising confession. Meanwhile, Bloody Face is finally unmasked. Psychological horror, starring Jessica Lange, James Cromwell and Evan Peters.(n)

programme.title: 100 Per Cent Hotter

programme.desc: Rory is upset to discover Lorelai has rekindled her relationship with Max and that Lane and Dean have become study partners. In a foul mood, she has a heated argument with her mother, before fleeing to her grandparents' house. Drama, starring Lauren Graham and Alexis Bledel.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Documentary series giving an insight into the world of debt collection from the perspectives of debtors, creditors and those who collect the payments. Brian and Graham have been warned to expect trouble as they evict some tenants from a south London flat, one of whom has a reputation for violence. Everything goes smoothly until the enforcement agents make a shocking discovery in a child's bedroom. Paul and Steve head to Slough to collect wages owed to a freelance worker, but the debtor is less than happy to find the high-court enforcement officers on his doorstep and things get physical.(n)

programme.title: Dance Moms

Abby choreographs a gritty group number to raise awareness of the plight of the homeless, while school principal Holly takes a leave of absence to dedicate herself to her daughter Nia's dance career.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.sub-title: Can't Pay? Special: Agents Under Attack.
programme.desc: Documentary giving an insight into cash-strapped Britain from the perspectives of debtors, creditors and those who collect the payments, including High Court enforcement bailiffs and repossession teams. The series follows each case as it unfolds, recording the thoughts and feelings on both sides, the process of repossession and the impact it has on all involved.(n)

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A cocky test pilot is given a mysterious ring by a dying alien and transported to another world, where he learns he has been recruited into a galactic peacekeeping organisation. He trains to use the incredible powers the ring grants him, and returns to Earth to defend it from a powerful force that feeds on fear. Sci-fi adventure, starring Ryan Reynolds, Blake Lively, Peter Sarsgaard and Mark Strong.(n)

programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

He trains to use the incredible powers the ring grants him, and returns to Earth to defend it from a powerful force that feeds on fear. Sci-fi adventure, starring Ryan Reynolds, Blake Lively, Peter Sarsgaard and Mark Strong.(n)

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Two software entrepreneurs go to Moscow for a business trip, when invisible aliens attack and begin slaughtering the populace. After several days in hiding, they emerge into a deserted city and, with the aid of other survivors, search for a way to get to safe territory and defend themselves against the invaders. Sci-fi horror, starring Emile Hirsch and Olivia Thirlby.(n)

programme.title: Le Divorce
programme.desc: Kate Hudson and Naomi Watts dazzle in this charming comedy of manners from Ismail Merchant and James Ivory. Hudson plays an aimless American who soaks up the local culture while visiting her unhappy, pregnant half-sister (Watts) in Paris. The stellar supporting cast includes Leslie Caron, Glenn Close, Sam Waterston and Stockard Channing(n)

programme.title: Prelude to a Kiss
programme.desc: Comic fairy tale about true love and misplaced spirits concerns a whirlwind romance and marriage, and the bride's strange behaviour after being kissed by an old man at her wedding(n)

programme.title: Say Anything...
programme.desc: Ione Skye plays a high-flying student, ready to take up a scholarship in England. Then she falls under the spell of rebellious John Cusack, much to the despair of her father. Cameron Crowe's comedy manages to break out of the teen-flick genre thanks to his direction and the three astute leads(n)

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: After losing his nerve, LA hostage negotiator Talley retires to a small town. But he must use his old skills when three hoodlums turn a carjacking into an armed stand-off(n)

programme.title: Shoot 'Em Up
programme.desc: The script is as bullet-riddled as the action in this over-the-top exercise in mayhem about a loner protecting a baby from hit men(n)

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: In this spy thriller set in the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin team up to stop an international criminal organisation that is trafficking nuclear weapons and technology. Adaptation of the TV series of the same name(n)

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Feelgood tennis romance from the makers of Notting Hill. Low-ranking British pro Peter is inspired to greatness in his last Wimbledon tournament when he starts dating American golden girl Lizzie. But while their love match spurs him on, her game falls apart..(n)

programme.title: 27 Dresses
programme.desc: Wedding mania gets a comic spin in the tale of Jane (Katherine Heigl), who's always a bridesmaid and never a bride. Jane's passion for all things nuptial is tested when she's asked to plan her sister's wedding to the man she secretly loves. A cynical columnist (James Marsden) who falls for Jane while surreptitiously writing a human-interest story about her further complicates Jane's dreams of love and marriage(n)

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: An orphan boy discovers his destiny as Peter Pan, and is whisked away to an enchanted land to battle the fearsome pirate Blackbeard with the help of the warrior woman Tiger Lily(n)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Supernatural smash-hit about a couple whose romance is shattered when the husband is murdered. Sam , now in spirit form, attempts to warn his wife Molly that she is in danger too, using fake spiritualist Oda Mae Browne as a psychic intermediary(n)

programme.title: The Witches of Eastwick
programme.desc: On Thursday nights three female friends -- Alex, Sukie, and Jane -- meet to chug martinis, learn Chinese aphrodisiac cooking and lament the scarcity of eligible men. As they sit around, they fantasize about and describe their idea of the ideal male. Arriving in town the following day is Satan, disguised as mysterious stranger Darrell Van Horn. One by one, Van Horne seduces each of the women. Then, strange things begin to happen(n)

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Driven by an extravagant, tour-de-force performance by Al Pacino, Scent of a Woman is the story of Frank Slade (Pacino), a blind, retired army colonel who hires Charlie Simms (Chris O'Donnell), a poor college student on the verge of expulsion, to take care of him over Thanksgiving weekend. At the beginning of the weekend, Frank takes Charlie to New York, where he reveals to the student that he intends to visit his family, have a few terrific meals, sleep with a beautiful woman and, finally, commit suicide. The film follows the mis-matched pair over the course of the weekend, as they learn about life through their series of adventures. Though the story is a little contrived and predictable, it pulls all the right strings, thanks to O'Donnell's sympathetic supporting role and Pacino's powerful lead performance, for which he won his first Academy Award. Scent of a Woman is based on the 1975 Italian film Profumo Di Donna(n)

programme.title: Feast of Love
programme.desc: A group of friends living in suburban Oregon come into contact with a sensual free spirit named Chloe (Alexa Davalos), who changes their outlook on life in the most unexpected of ways in this ensemble drama adapted from the acclaimed novel by author Charles Baxter. As college professor and writer Harry Stevenson (Morgan Freeman) sits quietly in the coffee shop of his tight-knit Oregon community, the local residents all around him all become swept up in the magical mischief of love. Coffee shop owner Bradley (Greg Kinnear) has a bad habit of looking for love in all the wrong places, and his relationship with wife Kathryn (Selma Blair) is a prime example of that penchant. Meanwhile, frazzled real estate agent Diana (Radha Mitchell) becomes ensnared in a taboo affair with a married man (Billy Burke), lovely newcomer Chloe attempts the formidable task of romancing troubled soul Oscar (Toby Hemingway), and Harry's own wife, Esther (Jane Alexander), affectionately tries to get through to her husband as he wrestles with the pain of losing a loved one. Fred Ward, Alexa Davalos, Stana Katic, Toby Hemingway, and Erika Maroszán star in a whimsical tale of intersecting lives inspired by Shakespeare's +Midsummer Night's Dream, and directed by Robert Benton (Nobody's Fool, The Human Stain)(n)

programme.title: Johnny Handsome
programme.desc: A physically deformed criminal is caught and nearly killed after being double-crossed by his partners. Offered cosmetic surgery to give him a fresh chance at life, he is tempted by revenge(n)

programme.title: Shoot 'Em Up
programme.desc: The script is as bullet-riddled as the action in this over-the-top exercise in mayhem about a loner protecting a baby from hit men(n)

programme.title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
programme.desc: Western drama about notorious train robber Jesse James, who welcomes a new gang member, unaware that Bob Ford is planning to kill him(n)

programme.title: Search Party
programme.desc: Distraught over the realization that they scared away a friend's fiancée, two hard-partying pals set out on a wild journey to Mexico to reunite the estranged couple by any means necessary(n)

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: Rusty Griswold, the youngest child from 1983's National Lampoon's Vacation is all grown up with a family of his own and fond childhood memories of a certain family road trip to Walley World, "America's Favorite Family Fun Park." Like his father, Clark (Chevy Chase), Rusty wants to forge closer bonds with his own family - wife Debbie (Christina Applegate) and boys James and Kevin (Skyler Gisondo and Steele Stebbins) - so he buys a souped-up Albanian van and convinces them to set off on their own crazy cross-country jaunt to Walley World. Directed by John Francis Daley and Jonathan M. Goldstein(n)

programme.title: Sea of Love
programme.desc: A veteran detective's search for a serial killer yields a seductive suspect(n)

programme.title: Head of State
programme.desc: When a presidential candidate dies unexpectedly in the middle of the campaign, the Democratic party unexpectedly picks a Washington, D.C. alderman, Mays Gilliam, as his replacement(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Spy thriller charting the life of the man charged with heading the CIA's covert operations and uncovering a mole during the Bay of Pigs scandal, revealing how he changed from a once idealistic student into the untrusting overlord of American espionage(n)

programme.title: Keeping the Faith
programme.desc: Terrific, lively comedy about two pals who grow up with the same vocation; one becomes a rabbi, the other a Catholic priest. But their faith and friendship are tested when an old schoolfriend shows up in town(n)

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Following up his critically acclaimed Monster's Ball, director Marc Forster took on this biography of playwright James Matthew Barrie, the scribe who penned the children's classic +Peter Pan. Johnny Depp stars as the turn-of-the-century writer as the film follows Barrie as he struggles to write and have his play produced while he cares for his down-on-their-luck neighbors who inspired the story in the first place. J.M. Barrie's Neverland also stars Dustin Hoffman, Kate Winslet, and Julie Christie(n)

programme.title: Renaissance Man
programme.desc: Comedy about a former ad executive who is forced by circumstances to take a temporary job teaching bottom-of-the-pile recruits at an Army training camp. Because of their below-average reading and writing skills, the youngsters seem unlikely to be accepted by the Army, but their new teacher turns out to possess a gift for motivating his students(n)

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: Juno may seem wise beyond her years, but after sleeping with classmate Bleeker, the pregnant teen quickly realises how little she really knows about life. Thankfully, Juno has been blessed with parents who trust their daughter's judgment, and a best friend named Leah, who's always willing to help out in a pinch(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Cedar Cove
programme.desc: Olivia comforts her best friend Grace when she is issued with divorce papers, and Justine makes a big decision when Warren reveals his plan to demolish the lighthouse and develop the land. Meanwhile, the owners of a local bed and breakfast decide to protest against the destruction and the case makes its way to Olivia's courtroom. Drama following the fortunes of a small-town judge, starring Andie MacDowell.(n)

programme.title: Cedar Cove
programme.desc: Jack's estranged son Eric turns up after being kicked out by his girlfriend in Vancouver. Charlotte is given a mysterious key by the elderly man she cares for, and tries to work out which lock it opens. Meanwhile, Maryellen becomes jealous when her mother praises Olivia's daughter. Drama following the fortunes of Olivia Lockhart, a small-town judge, both inside and away from the courtroom.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: New recruit Langston faces a steep learning curve on his first day as a routine burglary call is interrupted by an explosion at a couple's home. It appears that the husband died in the blast, but tests reveal he was murdered before the fire started and there are several suspects, including his adulterous wife. Langston impresses his colleagues by working out how the unusual detonating device was created.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Etude in Black
programme.desc: An orchestra conductor murders his mistress for threatening to reveal their affair, and makes her death look like suicide. However, he reckons without the intervention of crumpled cop Columbo, who sees through the subterfuge and determines to get to the truth. Detective drama, starring Peter Falk, John Cassavetes, Myrna Loy and Blythe Danner.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Any Old Port in a Storm
programme.desc: A vineyard owner's financial security is jeopardised when his playboy younger brother threatens to sell the family winery. He resorts to killing his sibling and rigging the death scene to look like a scuba-diving accident. However, the crumpled cop sees through the ruse and in the process reveals he is something of a wine buff himself. Detective drama, with Peter Falk, Donald Pleasence and Julie Harris.(n)

programme.title: Columbo: Negative Reaction
programme.desc: A successful photographer wants to get rid of his nagging wife so he can pursue an affair with his assistant. He murders his spouse and makes it look as if she was killed by a kidnapper, and at the same time puts an ex-con in the frame. However, the dogged detective sees through his ruse and proceeds to pick the story to pieces. Crime drama, with Peter Falk, Dick Van Dyke, Don Gordon and Antoinette Bower.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Sam heads to Sudan to help a CIA agent gather evidence of al-Qaeda terrorist training, but Callen is forced to rush to the country too, when one of them is killed while carrying out the mission. Crime drama, starring LL Cool J and Chris O'Donnell.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Deeks places his job in danger when he shoots and kills an unarmed man during a mission to retrieve Semtex explosives from a marine warehouse, prompting unexpected emotions for Kensi as she contemplates losing her partner. Crime drama, starring Eric Christian Olsen and Daniela Ruah.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A petty officer is killed by a stolen surveillance drone and the team links it to elusive terrorist Benham Parsa. NCIS joins forces with the Department of Defence to track down the device before it is used for a large-scale attack, but Gibbs is less than pleased that he has to work with his ex-lover Hollis Mann. Meanwhile, McGee hopes he will be granted time off to attend a black-tie gala honouring his girlfriend Delilah. Guest starring Susanna Thompson (Arrow).(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: The sudden death of a 17-year-old high-school student during a confrontation leads to the discovery of a dead cheerleader in a tree. As Ray and the team try to work out how the body got there, they uncover a strange connection to an illegal drag-racing group. Crime drama, starring Laurence Fishburne.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: The body of a former CIA director washes up in a swamp, and Langston suspects a revealing book he was working on could hold the key to his death. Meanwhile, a bassist in a country music band is electrocuted mid-song and Stokes and Catherine believe electrical evidence found in his guitar will help them trace the culprit. Crime drama, starring Laurence Fishburne and Jorja Fox.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Benson investigate the rape of Debbie Shields in her home and are approached by Captain Jackson, who is the father of the victim's partner Ann and a psychiatrist specialising in treating sex addicts. A particular phrase used by the assailant strikes a chord with Jackson, but he refuses to say why due to doctor-patient confidentiality - and Stabler goes undercover at his rehabilitation clinic after there is a similar attack in Virginia. Guest starring Jeremy Irons.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Warner attend the scene after assistant district attorney Page Ferguson falls to her death from the top of a multi-storey car park. Warner examines the body and initially concludes that the victim had been raped and cut with a knife, while Benson learns that she was leading a unit that prosecuted a gang of drug dealers - the head of which recently started a prison sentence due to her work.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A team investigates a young French model's claim that, after being brought to New York on a billionaire's private jet, she was raped by him at his 50th birthday party. The girl reveals there was another youngster on the plane, so Benson and Stabler try to trace the whereabouts of the potential witness.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler are appalled to discover that students at Westmore University watched a live internet broadcast of a woman being raped and never contacted the police. Another live stream is discovered showing the victim in an abandoned building begging for help, and when the detectives manage to trace the address they find a link to an abduction case that is still unsolved.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman who hosts a talk show that specialises in catching sexual predators is helped by the detectives to apprehend her latest target, but they also discover she has a stalker.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

Zachary realises that he has a stalker. Detective drama, starring Robert Taylor and Katee Sackhoff.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: After a teenager is found dead at a high-school party, the detectives go to great lengths to secure convictions against the two leading suspects. To complicate matters, a juror's attraction to Connie looks set to disrupt the subsequent trial. Drama, starring Alana De La Garza.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A psychotherapist is shot dead, and his wife stands trial for murder when it is revealed the man was involved in an inappropriate relationship with one of his teenage clients. However, when the widow reveals she was also one of the doctor's victims in her youth, the DA's office is forced to prove that childhood traumas are no excuse for killing someone.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The team investigates a case involving police officer Kevin Hopkins, who shot and killed a man while pursuing him following the burglary of a jewellery shop. Hopkins asserts that his actions were in self-defence - but his partner claims he did not hear an initial gunshot from the victim, whose hands also test negative for residue from the weapon. Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A marine major is found dead in an underground maintenance room, having scratched out one of his own eyes - and the presence of a webcam suggests someone watched him die. The team investigates with the help of Lt Col Hollis Mann, and links the case to wanted terrorist Mamoun Sharif, an old adversary who is threatening to unleash a chemical attack.(n)

programme.title: Cedar Cove
programme.desc: A dishevelled stranger turns up at the Thyme & Tide late one night seeking help, and while Bob is suspicious of the newcomer, Peggy takes pity on him and gives him a room for the night. However, when the couple find their guest dead in the morning, Sheriff Troy Davis is called in to investigate. Meanwhile, the day of the Art Walk arrives, and a visiting artist catches Maryellen's eye. Drama, starring Andie MacDowell.(n)

programme.sub-title: The Mystery of the Biker Bar.
programme.desc: The detective investigates when the owner of the biker bar where she and Jake had their first date is shot dead. Laura discovers many people who had issues with her old acquaintance - including a homeless man and an irate birdwatcher. Comedy drama, starring Debra Messing.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A woman's body is found in a lift, and McCoy finds his prosecution of the prime suspect hampered by a vindictive judge Ross offended in court.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A student is found stabbed to death in his flat, and a college friend is soon named prime suspect - but she claims the victim was a stranger who used a date rape drug on her. However, it soon emerges that the crime could have been racially motivated. Drama, with Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac, Hawkes and Lindsay investigate the death of a woman found on a subway train and discover that although her hands and face are covered in blood, she has no obvious injuries. Meanwhile, Danny and Stella visit the home of a playboy bachelor who drowned in his indoor pool - and are surprised to learn he has a wedding-cake decoration lodged in his lung. Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The unit is tipped off about terrorist activity, and two agents are murdered during the ensuing investigation. Believing the information to be a set-up, the team tries to solve the case with assistance from a guilt-stricken Paula Cassidy, who holds herself responsible for the tragedy. Drama, starring Jessica Steen.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: McGee feels the pressure as the team investigates a double murder that appears to be inspired by his still unpublished new novel. His sense of guilt is compounded by the realisation that one of his colleagues could become the killer's third target. American drama following the work of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service, starring Sean Murray and Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: In an effort to find the terrorist Parsa, Gibbs and the NCIS team track down one of his cohorts using evidence gleaned from the drone attack which has killed six people and wounded a further 22. Meanwhile, an emotionally shaken McGee struggles with the ramifications of the incident. Drama, starring Mark Harmon, Sean Murray, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A gruesome work of art in a painter's studio leads to the discovery of a woman's body in the flat above. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.title: White Lion
programme.desc: Destiny brings together a young lion and a young man in this drama from South African filmmaker Michael Swan. According to the legends of the Shangaan people of Africa, white lions are sacred creatures favored by the gods, and they're seen so rarely in the wild that when one is discovered, a Shangaan will be assigned to protect it. When a white lion cub is born near a Shangaan village, the other animals aren't sure what to make of the creature; the young lion named Letsatsi is rejected by its pride and must strike out on its own. Gisani (Thabo Malema), a Shangaan tribesman, learns that the white lion has left the wilds near his village and he follows Letsatsi to make sure the animal is safe and protect it from predators. An older lion named Nkulu makes friends with Letsatsi and shows the younger cat how to survive in the wild; meanwhile, Gisani takes a job as a hunting guide to support himself while staying in the wilds and keeping an eye on Letsatsi. However, when Nkulu is shot to death by a farmer and Letsatsi is targeted by one of Gisani's clients, the young warrior must take dramatic action to save the sacred lion. White Lion received its North American premiere at the 2010 Seattle International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Francis Ford Coppola's legendary continuation and sequel to his landmark 1972 film, The Godfather, parallels the young Vito Corleone's rise with his son Michael's spiritual fall, deepening The Godfather's depiction of the dark side of the American dream. In the early 1900s, the child Vito flees his Sicilian village for America after the local Mafia kills his family. Vito (Robert De Niro) struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and growing brood in Little Italy, killing the local Black Hand Fanucci (Gastone Moschin) after he demands his customary cut of the tyro's business. With Fanucci gone, Vito's communal stature grows, but it is his family (past and present) who matters most to him -- a familial legacy then upended by Michael's (Al Pacino) business expansion in the 1950s. Now based in Lake Tahoe, Michael conspires to make inroads in Las Vegas and Havana pleasure industries by any means necessary. As he realizes that allies like Hyman Roth (Lee Strasberg) are trying to kill him, the increasingly paranoid Michael also discovers that his ambition has crippled his marriage to Kay (Diane Keaton) and turned his brother, Fredo (John Cazale), against him. Barely escaping a federal indictment, Michael turns his attention to dealing with his enemies, completing his own corruption(n)

programme.title: Breaking Bad

programme.title: Breaking Bad
programme.desc: Phoenix. A new addition joins the White family as Walter Jr. attempts to help out his struggling family by launching a new Web site. Elsewhere, Jesse's addiction worsens and his relationship with Jane begins to negatively impact Walt and her father (John de Lancie)(n)

programme.title: Breaking Bad
programme.desc: ABQ. Skyler's frustration with Walter's secrecy boils over, and Jesse is dealt a devastating blow that leads him down a path of self-destruction(n)

Meanwhile, some of the problems between Walt and Gus improve; and Jesse seeks more independence and grabs a profitable opportunity that presents itself(n)

programme.title: Breaking Bad

programme.title: Breaking Bad

Meanwhile, Skyler worries that an accident that landed her former boss and boyfriend in the hospital could implicate her in his tax evasion scheme(n)

programme.title: Breaking Bad

programme.title: Breaking Bad
programme.desc: Confessions. Jesse decides to make a change; Walt and Skyler face an unexpected demand(n)

programme.title: Breaking Bad

programme.title: Breaking Bad
programme.desc: To'hajiilee. Things heat up for Walt in unexpected ways(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent(n)

programme.title: Mean Streets
programme.desc: Four friends in their 20s drift through life in the streets and bars of Manhattan's Little Italy. Often it's a bleak existence. When they're not hustling a crooked buck, the four drink, chase women and brawl — sometimes with each other(n)

programme.title: Bushwhacked
programme.desc: After he's framed for murder, a con artist turned deliveryman hides from authorities by posing as a wilderness survival-savvy scout leader(n)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: Romantic drama set in World War II about an American military pilot who travels to Britain to fight in the war in Europe but goes missing in action. Assuming he is dead, his girlfriend and best friend - who are stationed together in Hawaii - become romantically involved, but things become complicated when he comes back alive, just in time for the devastating Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor(n)

programme.title: Blood and Wine
programme.desc: Action-packed thriller about a crook who finds his crimes catching up with him. Alex Gates is a wine seller who juggles his wife Suzanne, stepson Jason and his mistress Gabriella while at the same time plotting fiendish robberies. His latest, the theft of a valuable diamond necklace with expert safe-cracker Victor Spansky, proves to be the last straw for Suzanne and Jason, who decide to leave Alex behind for good. There's just one problem: they have accidentally taken the stolen necklace with them, and now Alex and Victor will stop at nothing to get it back(n)

programme.title: Scream 2
programme.desc: While Scream (1996) was a funny, scary deconstruction of the slasher genre, its follow-up is just another horror sequel. The opening movie-theater sequence is even well-worn, being almost a shot-for-shot reconstruction of the beginning of He Knows You're Alone (1981), complete with a spooky trip to the restroom. The rest of the film follows tradition slavishly, and although the young cast is appealing and there are some nice individual moments, this film matches its predecessor neither in scares nor entertainment. Younger viewers -- who may not recognize every plot twist instantly -- should get a kick out of it anyway, but dedicated genre fans will be able to play connect-the-dots with the familiar storyline(n)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider

programme.desc: Down, Not Out. In the Season 8 premiere, Tia's out of commission while she recovers from surgery, so the kids temporarily take over at Villalobos, and one of their first tasks involves capturing a dog that's been taking shelter at a warehouse. Meanwhile, a family of eight from Oregon is looking for a new companion(n)

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Redeemed. Earl gets out of rehab and hopes that working with the dogs will help him rebuild his life; a New York couple would like to adopt a dog that isn't afraid of busy streets; Lizzy rescues a dog after coming to face-to-face with the person who abandoned it(n)

programme.title: Railroad Alaska
programme.desc: Frozen Danger. Off-grid settlers Jim, Nancy and John face being stranded without basic necessities when an avalanche hits and blocks the track. Roadmaster Hugh Evans battles freezing temperatures to get propane to the off-gridders before they literally freeze to death(n)

programme.title: Railroad Alaska
programme.desc: Killer Ice. When ice threatens to shut down the rails, pregnant off-gridder Amanda Simpson is left stranded while her friend seeks out supplies. Brakemen Danny and Animal must transport $5 million worth of freight to Anchorage, navigating a wild moose on the rails(n)

programme.title: Railroad Alaska
programme.desc: The Beast. A 67-tonne snowplow known as "The Beast" is employed by Danny and Animal as they race to clear the way for a freight train hauling much-needed diesel for the Port of Seward; at the same time, Hugh has a worried mother and two elderly homesteaders counting on him(n)

programme.title: Alaska: Battle on the Bay
programme.desc: Let the Battle Begin!. A reality series following five fishing boats on Bristol Bay opens with the beginning of an ultra-competitive, four-week sockeye salmon season, and the captains, including Tom Walsh and Leonard Ferrigno, going to extremes to jockey for position(n)

programme.title: Alaska: Battle on the Bay
programme.desc: The Big Gamble. The salmon season is in full swing and Captain Vince convinces his fishing partner Tom to undertake a risky run to Naknek. Will the gamble on Bristol Bay pay?(n)

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People: Alaskan Grit
programme.desc: Meet the Browns. An introduction to the Browns, an Alaska family who live in the wilderness(n)

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People: Alaskan Grit
programme.desc: Coupling Up. A small shack is built for the entire clan(n)

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier: The Frozen Edge
programme.desc: One for the Record Books. Atz Lee and Jane go ice fishing; Otto and Atz set out to help a fellow homesteader(n)

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier: The Frozen Edge
programme.desc: Season of the Sun. Eivin builds a chicken house; Jane fishes for king salmon; and Atz Lee hunts black bear(n)

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Run and You're Done. Dove season in Texas begins. Meanwhile, road hunters get an early start on deer season during a decoy sting in Beaumont; a rogue gator is lassoed near Texarkana; and citations are given for undersize fish on the Gulf Coast(n)

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People: Alaskan Grit
programme.desc: Meet the Browns. An introduction to the Browns, an Alaska family who live in the wilderness(n)

programme.desc: Coverage of today's meetings at Hereford, Downpatrick and Naas.(n)
