Thriller, based on a true story. A brilliant young mathematician is recruited by his professor (Kevin Spacey) to join a crack team of students whose system of card-counting is enabling them to win millions from the casinos of Las Vegas. How long can their winning streak last, however, once a suspicious head of casino security (Laurence Fishburne) makes it his mission to bring an end to their forbidden activities?(n)

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: An ex-con fights to protect his estranged teenage daughter after her boyfriend frames her for stealing money from a drug cartel(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Ben Gates embarks on another action-packed adventure when his ancestor is accused of involvement in Lincoln's assassination(n)

programme.title: Black Sails
programme.desc: XXXVII. Silver and his men track Flint on Skeleton Island; Madi receives an offer; Rogers struggles to hear Eleanor; Billy casts his lot(n)

programme.title: Misconduct
programme.desc: A lawyer attempts to bring an unethical pharmaceutical executive to justice for manipulating drug trials, but his case is soon undermined when he is targeted by a blackmail scheme involving an extramarital affair(n)

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
programme.desc: Ridley Scott's epic historical drama is set in the 12th century at the Crusader defence of Jerusalem. Orlando Bloom plays Balian de Ibelin, a village blacksmith and the illegitimate son of Godfrey de Ibelin, a crusader knight returned from the Holy Land. He persuades Balian that riches await those who go to defend the city and its Christian King Baldwin against the attack of Saladin, who seeks to win the city back for the Muslim faith. Balian, as well as falling for Baldwin's sister Sibylla, finds himself a power broker between the two factions, with the fate of the city in his hands(n)

programme.title: Cry Wolf
programme.desc: Cynical students blame a local's death on a fictitious serial killer they christen 'The Wolf'. Then the rumour quickly spreads out of control, fuelled by more killings(n)

programme.title: White Noise
programme.desc: Michael Keaton stars as an architect who is shattered by the death of his beloved wife, and is then contacted by a man (Ian McNeice) who claims he is receiving messages from his dead wife through Electronic Voice Phenomena, The grieving widower ultimately is convinced of the communication's validity, and soon becomes fixated on trying to contact his wife himself -- but his investigation into EVP inadvertently unlocks a door to another terrifying world(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on US President George W Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after questions were raised about the validity of key documents in the report(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Ben Gates embarks on another action-packed adventure when his ancestor is accused of involvement in Lincoln's assassination(n)

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: A misfit boy befriends the new girl in school and together they dream up a fantasy kingdom, where they embark on a series of wild adventures. Josh Hutcherson and AnnaSophia Robb star in this magical adaptation of the classic children's novel. Directed by Gabor Csupo(n)

programme.title: High School Musical 3: Senior Year
programme.desc: The third entry in the series is another song-and-dance extravaganza that sees the gang being faced with important life decisions regarding their futures(n)

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Touching drama based on the true life story of a coach who dropped out of minor league baseball because of an injury, aged 23, and coached high school baseball during the twelve years since. His team's surprise success means he must honour a promise to try out as a pitcher for a professional team, with inspiring results(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Treasure hunter Ben Gates embarks on another action-packed adventure when his ancestor is accused of involvement in Lincoln's assassination(n)

programme.title: Leaving Las Vegas
programme.desc: Moving, gritty drama about the genuine love shared by a couple who have hit rock bottom. An alcoholic, fired from his Hollywood job, moves to Vegas with the intention of drinking himself to death. He meets a prostitute on the run from her pimp, they fall in love and he moves in. They make a pact that she will not ask him to stop drinking and he will not question her lifestyle. Nicolas Cage won an Oscar for Best Actor for his performance(n)

programme.title: Testament of Youth
programme.desc: Free-spirited Vera Brittain overcomes adversity too win a scholarship to Oxford. While there, she falls in love with Roland Leighton and they begin to pursue their dreams together. But, the onset of World War I rips them apart, and Vera learns first hand the horrors and atrocities of war(n)

programme.title: 20 Years of Madness
programme.desc: A group of Generation X friends reunite to create a new episode of their mid-'90s public-access show, and they are forced to confront their past hopes and dreams in the face of the realities of adulthood(n)

programme.title: Like Water for Chocolate
programme.desc: A classic of romantic and foodie cinema. The twin themes of sexuality and food provide potent ingredients for comedy and tenderness. Set during the Mexican revolution the film begins and ends in the kitchen. Tita, is forced to prepare the wedding banquet for the man she loves but cannot have and she transfers all her emotions and feelings into the food, these emotions being passed on to anyone who tastes her cooking(n)

programme.title: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
programme.desc: A surreal crime drama told as only Jim Jarmusch could, Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai stars Forest Whitaker as Ghost Dog, a hit man living in an unidentified but run-down city in what license plates call "The Industrialized State." Known for his gift of being able to come and go without people noticing him, Ghost Dog is a self-taught samurai who is obsessed with order and his strict personal moral code, drawn from the philosophies of the Japanese warriors. As every samurai needs a leader to whom he swears loyalty, Ghost Dog has devoted himself the service of Louie (John Tormey), a low-level crime boss who once saved his life. When Louie's superiors decide he must be executed, Ghost Dog leaps into action, methodically wiping out his many enemies. Along with a dizzying series of stylized shoot-outs, Ghost Dog also features carrier pigeons, characters who read Rashomon, a French-speaking ice cream man, and a score by RZA from the top-selling hip-hop group Wu-Tang Clan, who have their own well-documented obsession with Asian culture. Ghost Dog was screened in competition at the 1999 Cannes Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Testament of Youth
programme.desc: Free-spirited Vera Brittain overcomes adversity too win a scholarship to Oxford. While there, she falls in love with Roland Leighton and they begin to pursue their dreams together. But, the onset of World War I rips them apart, and Vera learns first hand the horrors and atrocities of war(n)

programme.title: Solitary Man
programme.desc: Michael Douglas stars in this affecting comedy-drama about an unscrupulous New York businessman who attempts to pick up the pieces after a series of poor decisions leaves his life in ruins. In order to succeed, he must keep his lewd impulses in check. But when Ben takes his new girlfriend's college-bound daughter to look at a prospective school, everything starts to fall apart(n)

programme.title: Jimmy's Hall
programme.desc: In this fascinating drama set in 1932 and based on actual events, Irish political activist Jimmy Gralton reopens a community hall in his hometown with the help of the locals. However, he faces opposition from both the government and a crotchety priest, who suspect the hall is a hotbed for loose morals and communist activity(n)

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: In this riveting thriller, an assassination attempt is made on the president in front of a crowd, but no two witnesses can agree on who did what to whom. A Secret Service agent (Dennis Quaid) must race against time to uncover the shocking truth before the conspirators escape. Matthew Fox, Sigourney Weaver, Forest Whitaker, William Hurt(n)

programme.title: The Runaways
programme.desc: Kristin Stewart and Dakota Fanning star in Floria Sigismondi's rock biopic, based on Cherie Curie's autobiographical account. It's the mid-1970s and Southern Californian teen Joan Larkin has changed her name to Joan Jett. Along with her new dark, edgy identity comes a nascent desire: to create an all-girl rock band. Joan and her aggressive manager Kim Fowley stumble across the perfect face for the band: the 15-year-old blonde bombshell Cherie Curie. The two girls become close, with Cherie's sweet melodies slickly harmonising with Joan's electrifying guitar solos to great effect. They name themselves The Runaways and, after recruiting a lead guitarist and a bass player, are soon signed to Mercury Records, plunging them into the deep end of 70s rock excess. The success of their first album is massive. But, after a concert in Japan, the rest of the band discover magazines that feature only pictures of Cherie inside them - and are furious that they've been left out. Cherie begins to crumble under the pressures of being the face of the band, and starts to find solace in alcohol and drugs. As the band's stability disintegrates, can the girls rediscover the fun, runaway rock and roll lifestyle they sought?(n)

programme.title: Henry Poole Is Here
programme.desc: Divine, Capra-esque comedy-drama starring Luke Wilson as a depressed man who moves into a run-down, suburban L.A. neighborhood hoping for some peace and quiet, but his well-meaning, religious neighbors think otherwise. When one of them spots the outline of a holy being on his stucco wall, his sanctuary turns into a blessed site to which people from miles around flock, looking for miracles. Radha Mitchell, Adriana Barraza, George Lopez, Cheryl Hines, Morgan Lily. Directed by Mark Pellington(n)

programme.title: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
programme.desc: A surreal crime drama told as only Jim Jarmusch could, Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai stars Forest Whitaker as Ghost Dog, a hit man living in an unidentified but run-down city in what license plates call "The Industrialized State." Known for his gift of being able to come and go without people noticing him, Ghost Dog is a self-taught samurai who is obsessed with order and his strict personal moral code, drawn from the philosophies of the Japanese warriors. As every samurai needs a leader to whom he swears loyalty, Ghost Dog has devoted himself the service of Louie (John Tormey), a low-level crime boss who once saved his life. When Louie's superiors decide he must be executed, Ghost Dog leaps into action, methodically wiping out his many enemies. Along with a dizzying series of stylized shoot-outs, Ghost Dog also features carrier pigeons, characters who read Rashomon, a French-speaking ice cream man, and a score by RZA from the top-selling hip-hop group Wu-Tang Clan, who have their own well-documented obsession with Asian culture. Ghost Dog was screened in competition at the 1999 Cannes Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Labyrinth of Lies
programme.desc: In this historical drama, idealistic German public prosecutor Johann Radmann (Alexander Fehling) becomes interested in the case of Charles Schulz, a former Nazi officer at Auschwitz who is now a schoolteacher. Radmann initially encounters resistance from the rest of his department when he begins his investigation, but senior prosecutor Walter Friedberg (Robert Hunger-Buhler) ultimately allows him to build as many cases as possible against the 8000 people who worked at the death camp. Helmed by first-time feature-film director Giulio Ricciarelli, Labyrinth of Lies is based on the Frankfurt Auschwitz trials, a previously lesser-known chapter of Germany's post-WWII history in which the country was forced to reckon with the Nazis who returned to everyday life following the end of the war. Germany's official Foreign Language submission for the 2016 Academy Awards. Friederike Becht, Andre Szymanski, and Hansi Jochmann co-star(n)

programme.title: Son of Saul
programme.desc: Saul, a Hungarian prisoner, is assigned to burn the corpses of his own people in one of the Auschwitz Crematoriums. He finds moral survival when he tries to secure a proper Jewish burial of his son(n)

programme.title: Like Water for Chocolate
programme.desc: A classic of romantic and foodie cinema. The twin themes of sexuality and food provide potent ingredients for comedy and tenderness. Set during the Mexican revolution the film begins and ends in the kitchen. Tita, is forced to prepare the wedding banquet for the man she loves but cannot have and she transfers all her emotions and feelings into the food, these emotions being passed on to anyone who tastes her cooking(n)

programme.title: Moonlight Mile
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman and Susan Sarandon star in writer-director Brad Silberling's heartfelt drama about a New England couple mourning their slain daughter while trying to accept her equally distraught fiancé (Jake Gyllenhaal) as the son they never had. Holly Hunter, Dabney Coleman(n)

programme.title: Daddy Don't Go
programme.desc: Four disadvantaged fathers from New York City struggle to provide and make lives for their families(n)

programme.title: Solitary Man
programme.desc: Michael Douglas stars in this affecting comedy-drama about an unscrupulous New York businessman who attempts to pick up the pieces after a series of poor decisions leaves his life in ruins. In order to succeed, he must keep his lewd impulses in check. But when Ben takes his new girlfriend's college-bound daughter to look at a prospective school, everything starts to fall apart(n)

programme.title: The Anniversary Party
programme.desc: Jennifer Jason Leigh and Alan Cumming co-wrote, co-directed and costar in this well-acted, all-star comedy-drama about a show-business couple's sixth-anniversary bash---a daylong affair of sex, drugs, professional rivalries and personal grudges. Kevin Kline, Phoebe Cates, Gwyneth Paltrow, Jane Adams, John C. Reilly, John Benjamin Hickey, Parker Posey(n)

programme.title: Angela's Ashes
programme.desc: Born in Brooklyn, NY, young Frank moves at an early age to Limerick, Ireland, with his parents Angela and Malachy, who have been unable to support their family in America and are hoping for better prospects in their home country. But things hardly improve once they settle in Limerick. Worse yet is the miserable Irish Catholic childhood(n)

programme.title: Pi
programme.desc: Max is a reclusive mathematician who's built a supercomputer that will not only provide him with the key to cracking the stock market but may also reveal the true name of Jehovah, a discovery that could lead to the end of the world. But his search brings him to the attention of both Hassidic priests and Wall Street gurus. With Mark Margolis, Ben Shenkman and Pamela Hart(n)

programme.title: Grindhouse
programme.desc: Kill Bill director Quentin Tarantino and Sin City director Robert Rodriguez join forces to offer a cinematic tribute to the blood-soaked exploitation epics of yesteryear with this hyper-violent coupling of two full-length features punctuated by a collection of outrageous trailers. The first segment, directed by Rodriguez and entitled Planet Terror, details the violent struggle between a ravenous army of zombie-like humanoids who have taken control of the planet and the remaining survivors who refuse to go down without a fight. Freddy Rodriguez, Naveen Andrews, and Rose McGowan headline a cast that also includes Marley Shelton, Michael Biehn, Josh Brolin, Bruce Willis, and Tom Savini. In Death Proof -- director Tarantino's take on such peddle-to-the-metal shockers as White Line Fever -- Kurt Russell stars as an engine-revving psychopath who prefers to take out his beautiful victims at 200 mph. With a list of potential roadkill candidates that includes Rose McGowan, Jordan Ladd, Rosario Dawson, and Vanessa Ferlito, Death Proof takes viewers on an adrenaline-infused drive that's as sexy as it is shocking. Its tantalizing title borrowed from the term frequently used to describe the seedy, 1970s-era inner-city movie theaters that screened excessive, low-budget independent films containing copious amounts of violence and nudity as a means of offering counter-programming to the decidedly more restrained big-budget studio films, Grindhouse takes its love for these unabashedly sleazy efforts one step further by offering a jaw-dropping collection of fake exploitation trailers from such directors as Rob Zombie, Eli Roth, and Edgar Wright(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: En esta descarnada saga de venganza, una asesina está en el altar cuando su despiadado empleador, Bill, y otros miembros de su círculo de asesinos le disparan a matar. Pero ella sobrevive y se dispone a matar a Bill y a todos los que la agraviaron, dejand(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
programme.desc: Lethal bride Uma Thurman is back to hunt down the last of her targets in the conclusion to Quentin Tarantino's bloody revenge epic(n)

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
programme.desc: A band of criminals are assembled for a jewel heist by a kingpin who keeps them anonymous from each other. But when the job goes wrong, the group is left bloodied and panicked, wondering who among them is the rat(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Director Stephen Chow made his name in this country with the deliriously wonderful Shaolin Soccer and Kung Fu Hustle continues his love of comedy kung-fu films. Set in pre-revolutionary China, Chow plays Sing, a street hustler who makes the mistake of pretending to be a member of the notorious Axe gang. He becomes caught up in a war between the gang and the residents of Pig Sty Alley, which the gang want to take over. Little do they know that two of the Alley's residents are retired martial arts experts and soon the fists and feet are flying in knockabout fights that owe as much to Kill Bill (some of the wire work is done by Yuen Wo Ping, who worked on Tarantino's film) as they do to classic Hollywood silent comedies. Film fans can enjoy Chow's references to films ranging from Top Hat to The Shining while the rest can just enjoy a wildly entertaining romp. In Cantonese with English subtitles(n)

programme.title: Sexting
programme.desc: Warren P. Sonoda directs this delightfully quirky comedy following a pair of young lovers who use their mobile phones to free themselves from old relationships so that they may pursue one another(n)

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director implores a call girl-turned-actress to turn her life around while the star of his latest production makes a play for his wife in this ensemble comedy(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prequel in which prehistoric everyman Fred Flintstone woos wealthy Wilma Slaghoople as the fledgling couple travel to glitzy Rock Vegas with friends Barney Rubble and Betty O'Shale(n)

programme.title: Getting Even With Dad
programme.desc: Family comedy in which a teenager blackmails his crooked father into being a better dad. Small-time thief Ray Gleason is lumbered with his teenage son Timmy, who was looked after by his sister while Ray was in prison. Discovering his father's plans to steal a valuable set of coins and set up a bakery shop, Timmy pockets the proceeds of the heist and blackmails him into being a better dad - and giving him the attention he deserves(n)

programme.title: Kingdom Come
programme.desc: Based on the play +Dearly Departed by David Dean Bottrell and Jessie Jones (who also penned this screenplay), this new comedy from the director of Jason's Lyric looks at a family gathering after one of their clan dies of a stroke. In the midst of a sweltering summer, the Slocumb family convenes. They include Charisse (Jada Pinkett Smith), the long-suffering, frustrated wife of philandering Junior (Anthony Anderson); there's also the Bible-spouting Marguerite (Loretta Devine), who prays to save her hard-living son Royce (Darius McCrary) from a life on welfare. Lucille (Vivica A. Fox) is the devoted family peacekeeper who is struggling with a money-grubbing funeral director, and her husband Ray Bud (L.L. Cool J) has major contempt for his family and wishes he were burying them instead. Kingdom Come also features Cedric the Entertainer as an intestinally challenged reverend and Whoopi Goldberg as the family matriarch(n)

programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: The Johnsons set out from California for a family reunion in Missouri. The parents are split up, the kids are arguing - can everyone keep it together for the big day?(n)

programme.title: Sunshine Cleaning
programme.desc: A single mother struggling to make ends meet persuades her slacker sister to go into the crime-scene-cleanup business to make some quick cash(n)

programme.title: The Brothers Grimsby
programme.desc: In this unbelievably raunchy comedy, a British superspy is forced to team up with his long-lost brother, a working-class soccer hooligan, in order to defeat a terrorist organization(n)

programme.title: Ricki and the Flash
programme.desc: An aging rocker returns home to her estranged family after years on the road following her dreams, and must face the music as she tries to make things right with her loved ones(n)

programme.title: Superstar
programme.desc: Molly Shannon recreates her Saturday Night Live persona as a Catholic schoolgirl who dreams of becoming a Hollywood star and marrying the best-looking boy in school(n)

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director implores a call girl-turned-actress to turn her life around while the star of his latest production makes a play for his wife in this ensemble comedy(n)

programme.desc: In this unbelievably raunchy comedy, a British superspy is forced to team up with his long-lost brother, a working-class soccer hooligan, in order to defeat a terrorist organization(n)

programme.title: A Fish Called Wanda
programme.desc: Offbeat comedy revolving around lust, greed and seafood. Stuffy London barrister falls for sexy American gangster's moll whose psychopathic boyfriend is planning an elaborate jewel heist - in which the stuffy London barrister is unwittingly to play a part(n)

programme.title: Cadillac Man
programme.desc: Fraught comedy drama about a philandering car salesman whose world comes crashing in around him when he finds himself in debt to the Mob and in danger of losing his job - and just about everything else. Matters come to a head when a jealous husband, whose wife he has been bedding, decides to take the law into his own hands(n)

programme.title: Postcards from the Edge
programme.desc: A Hollywood movie star is trying to rebuild her life following a drug overdose. Once out of rehab, however, she discovers the only way she'll be hired for another film is if she moves back in with her alcoholic, ex-actress mother(n)

programme.title: Sweet Home Alabama
programme.desc: George and Madeleine meet at an art acution and it is love at first sight. After six months of marriage, they travel to North Carolina to meet George's family who are fundamental Christians. This meeting of opposites exposes the fragile family dynamics as hidden resentments and anxieties surface(n)

programme.desc: Gwen Cummings (Sandra Bullock) is a journalist who is fond of alcohol, parties and night life. At the beginning, Gwen cannot admit her addiction, but after meeting Eddie Boone (Viggo Mortensen), a baseball player under treatment, her attitude starts to change(n)

programme.desc: Reeling from personal and professional disappointments, a musician moves into the Hamptons home of her father, a Sinatra-esque crooner still hoping to make a career comeback. In time, father and daughter bond while seeking success in the music industry(n)

programme.desc: LA publisher George boards a Chicago-bound train hoping to relax. But a flirtation with sexy secretary Hilly leads him into a runaway situation of action, murder and intrigue(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: In this offbeat comedy from Woody Allen, nothing can snap a cynical philosophy professor out of a mental funk, except for a young student whose presence offers a breath of fresh air in his otherwise unfulfilling existence(n)

programme.desc: In this continuation of the epic space opera, an ex-stormtrooper, a scrappy desert dweller and a droid companion embark on a journey that brings them face-to-face with heroes from the past, who are now battling a fascist regime called the First Order(n)

programme.title: Blue Collar
programme.desc: A fingernail begrimed tale of shopfloor greed and corruption, with Richard Pryor, Yaphet Kotto and Harvey Keitel all outstanding as the three machinists who realise their union is selling them out(n)

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: This sports-drama centres on the research conducted by forensic neuropathologist that raised public awareness about Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy resulting from such high-impact sports as professional football(n)

programme.title: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
programme.desc: Angela Bassett stars in this sexy, sassy romantic comedy about a 40-year-old mother who realises her life may be heading in the wrong direction. Stella Payne is a workaholic San Franciscan executive who spends what little spare time she has with her family. But then it occurs to her that she's missing out on something big - romance. Having encountered Winston Shakespeare (Taye Diggs), a Jamaican man 20 years her junior, Stella decides the time has come to get back on the dating circuit. but just how will she go about getting back her groove?(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
programme.desc: In this continuation of the epic space opera, an ex-stormtrooper, a scrappy desert dweller and a droid companion embark on a journey that brings them face-to-face with heroes from the past, who are now battling a fascist regime called the First Order(n)

programme.title: Black Sails
programme.desc: XXXVI. A rescue plan may come between Flint and Silver; Max discovers the real price of freedom; Rackham tracks his prey; the Walrus sails into uncharted territory(n)

programme.title: In the Mix
programme.desc: R&B singer Usher stars in Ron Underwood's crime caper as Darrell, a DJ who, through a series of coincidences, ends up bodyguard to Dolly, daughter of Mafia mobster Frank. The two fall for each other, much to the anger of Frank, who as well as trying to keep control of his daughter, has to contend with a major Mob power struggle. As the bullets fly, Darrell finds he's not only protecting Dolly, but also Frank and himself!(n)

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: This sports-drama centres on the research conducted by forensic neuropathologist that raised public awareness about Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy resulting from such high-impact sports as professional football(n)

programme.title: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
programme.desc: After twenty years, Laurie Strode, now the headmistress of a private school, is still struggling with the memories of the maniac killer, Michael Myers - when suddenly he reappears - with a vengeance..(n)

programme.title: Prom Night
programme.desc: One of the most notorious slasher films of the 1980s returns to terrorize filmgoers with this blood-soaked remake that proves just how horrifying high school dances can truly be. Donna Keppel (Brittany Snow) has survived a terrible tragedy, but now the time has come to leave the past behind and celebrate her senior prom in style. When the big night finally arrives, Donna and her best friends prepare to enjoy their last big high-school blowout by living it up and partying till dawn. But while Donna is willing to look past her nightmares and into a brighter future, the man she thought she had escaped forever has returned for one last dance. An obsessed killer is on the loose, and he'll slay anyone who attempts to prevent him from reaching his one and only Donna. Who will survive to see graduation day, and what will Donna do when she's forced to confront her greatest fear? Scott Porter, Jessica Stroup, and Dana Davis co-star in the slasher remake that will have tuxedo-clad teens everywhere nervously looking over their shoulders as they file out onto the dance floor(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens

programme.title: Hart's War
programme.desc: Second World War drama in which a former law student - now a lieutenant in the army - is forced to defend himself and two black officers after a murder occurs in the POW camp to which they have been sent. Meanwhile, a wily colonel plans to use the distraction of the investigation to plot a daring escape(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Jerry Maguire es uno de los mejores hombres de SMI, una cotizada agencia dedicada a la promoción de deportistas. Su vida es perfecta hasta el día en el que se da cuenta de la importancia que tienen las personas sobre el dinero. Ese día es despedido y abandonado por todos sus amigos. Ahora viene lo más difícil, empezar de cero con un futbolista de segunda categoría como único cliente y una madre soltera como secretaria(n)

programme.title: The Devil's Rejects
programme.desc: Three psychopathic family members go on a killing spree as a vengeful sheriff tracks their trail in this sequel to "House of 1000 Corpses"(n)

programme.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
programme.desc: The Avengers reassemble to put a stop to the evil Ultron's villainous plans before it is too late(n)

programme.title: Tank Girl
programme.desc: It is the year 2033 and Tank Girl, runs an army of half-men, half-kangaroo rebels known as the Rippers. Their sworn enemy is Kesslee has turned the world into a desolate wasteland by withholding the now-precious liquid from the majority of the population. Only Tank Girl, with her charm, impudence and sexuality, has the capability of taking Kesslee on, and he should not underestimate the power of a girl and her tank!(n)

programme.title: Operation: Endgame
programme.desc: The assassination of a spy boss triggers internecine warfare among rival teams of clandestine government agents in a secret underground complex(n)

Isaac Hayes, Jerry Butler, Sam Moore, Rufus Thomas, Carla Thomas, Wilson Pickett, Ann Peebles, Mary Wilson(n)

programme.desc: A preview of the 2017 sci-fi film "Life," starring Ryan Reynolds and Jake Gyllenhaal(n)

programme.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron

Cast includes Morgan Freeman, Jenna Saras and Karl Thaning(n)

programme.title: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
programme.desc: The up-and-down-and-up-again story of musician Dewey Cox, whose songs would change a nation. On his rock 'n roll spiral, Cox sleeps with 411 women, marries three times, has 22 kids and 14 step-kids, stars in his own 70s TV show, collects friends ranging from Elvis to the Beatles to a chimp, and gets addicted to - and then kicks - every drug known to man; but despite it all, Cox grows into a national icon and eventually earns the love of a good woman - longtime backup singer Darlene(n)

programme.title: Dragonslayer
programme.desc: Atmospheric fantasy-adventure set in the Dark Ages, in which a sorcerer's apprentice is confronted with the task of slaying a dragon. When King Tyrian's kingdom is invaded by the fire-breathing monster, he is ready to sacrifice every virgin in the land in exchange for peace, and his own daughter volunteers her life. Ulrich the great sorcerer and his apprentice try to save the princess, but Ulrich's magic is fading fast(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Holiday
programme.desc: All a young girl wants for Christmas is a husband for her divorced mother, so she dumps the problem into the lap of a department-store Santa, who decides to handle the matter personally(n)

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: Feeling that something is lacking in their lives, the family of suburbanite Charles Grodin adopts a stray St. Bernard puppy. The cute lite beast grows up to be the less-than-cute Beethoven, a sloppy, slobbery, oversized and extremely destructive animal. Beethoven also brings with him a lot of hidden baggage in the form of evil veterinarian Dean Jones, who'll stop at nothing to steal Beethoven for the purposes of his insidious lab experiment. Several sequels followed, beginning with 1993 Beethoven's Second(n)

programme.title: Beethoven's 2nd
programme.desc: Beethoven the St. Bernard dog becomes a father, but his girlfriend Missy is dog-napped, and his puppies are in danger of the same fate(n)

programme.desc: Second sequel in the series about the lovable St Bernard and his long-suffering owners. The Newtons leave Beethoven with their relatives while they take a vacation. Beethoven accompanies the relatives to a family reunion in California, but on the way, they find themselves pursued by a pair of bumbling crooks with their eyes on a very special DVD player(n)

programme.title: Beethoven's 4th
programme.desc: In this family adventure, it's a case of doggie double-trouble as the lovable St. Bernard bounds back into action. Canine chaos ensues when the destructive dog is sent to obedience school and gets mixed up with a well-bred look-alike. Judge Reinhold and Julia Sweeney star. Joe Pichler, Michaela Gallo, Kaleigh Krish, Matt McCoy, Veanne Cox(n)

programme.title: Beethoven's 5th
programme.desc: In this charming installment of the series, the mischievous canine digs up an old $10 bill, which turns out to be part of a missing fortune. Suddenly he's the most popular dog in town. Daveigh Chase, Dave Thomas, Sammy Kahn, Faith Ford, John Larroquette, Clint Howard, Katherine Helmond(n)

programme.title: Beethoven's Big Break
programme.desc: Eddie, a struggling animal trainer and single dad suddenly finds himself the personal wrangler for a large and lovable St. Bernard whose fabulous movie audition catapults the dog to stardom. However, a trio of unscrupulous ne'er-do-wells have plans to kidnap the famous dog and hold him for ransom(n)

programme.title: Beethoven's Christmas Adventure
programme.desc: When a precocious elf crash-lands in the neighborhood of Beethoven, the talking St. Bernard, and a load full of presents are lost, it's up to Beethoven and his human pals to track down the goodies, help the elf and save Christmas(n)

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: Harassed businessman Howard tells his little boy he'll buy him a Turboman for Christmas, only to find that every store has sold out. Racing round the shops in search of the last toy, he realises that postman Myron is doing exactly the same thing. Comedy(n)

programme.desc: A family holiday gets competitive when dad of 12 Tom Baker discovers that his childhood rival has hit the big time and erected a huge holiday home on the same lake(n)

programme.title: Wild Hogs

programme.title: Beethoven

The cute lite beast grows up to be the less-than-cute Beethoven, a sloppy, slobbery, oversized and extremely destructive animal. Beethoven also brings with him a lot of hidden baggage in the form of evil veterinarian Dean Jones, who'll stop at nothing to steal Beethoven for the purposes of his insidious lab experiment. Several sequels followed, beginning with 1993 Beethoven's Second(n)

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: (2003) When the world is struck by extraordinary phenomena, it becomes apparent that the planet's core has stopped moving, causing electro-magnetic mayhem. The only hope lies in a crack team of scientists (led by Aaron Eckhart and including Stanley Tucci, Hilary Swank and Delroy Lindo) burrowing to the core and re-starting Earth's engine. But is the disaster natural or is there a more sinister explanation? Jon Amiel's taut science-fiction special-effects extravaganza eschews outer space for inner space. Edited for language(n)

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 2
programme.desc: After the runaway success of Jeepers Creepers in 2001, it was inevitable there would be a sequel, but this is just as smart and scary as the original. The Creeper has just two days of his allotted 23 on earth left to both eat his fill and replenish body parts that have decayed during his enforced years of hibernation. Fortunately, a broken-down bus full of college basketball players and their cheerleaders should provide for his needs. As the students are picked off one by one, their only hope is local farmer Jack Taggart, who's out to avenge his son's death. Victor Salva's film is satisfyingly full of edge-of-the-seat moments, not to mention the required quota of gruesome deaths and gore(n)

programme.title: The Faculty
programme.desc: The kids at Herrington High make a discovery that confirms their worst suspicions - their teachers are from another planet! As mind-controlling parasites spread from the faculty to the students' bodies, it's up to the ones who are left to save the world!(n)

programme.title: The Darkest Hour

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: Roland Emmerich's blockbuster of a science fiction film sees aliens reach Earth. And they're decidedly hostile - their plan is to suck the planet of all its resources and leave behind a burnt cinder circling the sun before moving on. Planting giant ships above the world's major cities, they unleash destruction on an unprecedented scale (superbly caught by the special effects). All attempts at fighting back are met by hordes of fighter craft until pilot Steven Hiller manages to down one and capture the pilot. In tandem, scientist David Levinson, having worked out their purpose, also works out a way to destroy them but he and Hiller need a space craft. Which brings them to a secret base near Las Vegas. The child of countless science fiction movies, Independence Day is rollicking, fast-moving fun and if the fate of the remains of the human race is never in doubt, there's enough tension and action to carry even the most jaundiced viewer along(n)
